ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Horizons (was Official confirmation from Ester)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Grief PKing was solved by creating a complete duplicate of the UO world where pking is not allowed at all. i.e. Adding a switch. -- Artificial
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Sep 08/00, "Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" <g4mntofcr@...> wrote:
>
> UWOO and Anarchy Online are in the same category. The developers from both
> of those games have promised a new PvP system which will largely eliminate
> grief PKers but still promote PvP (i.e. guildwars). UWOO has guaranteed
> their new system will work. Remains to be seen though. Also, I've never
> played UO, but from what I've read on the UWOO mailing list, grief PKing in
> UO now has been largely solved. No idea how it was solved though.

Grief PKing was "solved" by creating a complete duplicate of the UO
world where pking is not allowed at all. i.e. Adding a switch.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
